verses.roman:
śuni' sārvabhauma hailā atyanta kātara
caraṇe dhariyā kahe viṣāda-uttara

synonyms: śuni'-hearing this; sārvabhauma-Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; hailā-became; atyanta-greatly; kātara-agitated; caraṇe-the lotus feet; dhariyā-taking; kahe-says; viṣāda-of lamentation; uttara-a reply.
translation: Upon hearing this, Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya became very agitated. Catching hold of the lotus feet of Caitanya Mahāprabhu, he gave this sorrowful reply.
